levels.description: After deployment, immediately loses <@ba.vdown>{hp_ratio:0%}</> current HP. For <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds after deployment, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and attacks deal <@ba.vup>Arts damage</>
